ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars-Pantron takes his leave
ygData.msgSnippet: Phobia expected treachery, Soon as he exits, recall the pod. The pod rose up on remote control, a message broadcast from it s loudspeaker, Go Pantron,run

Phobia expected treachery, "Soon as he exits, recall the pod." The 
pod rose up on remote control, a message broadcast from it's 
loudspeaker,"Go Pantron,run free, just be glad I'm not a vengeful 
Predicon."He could have overridden the pod at any time if he'd wished 
the ship was after all tuned to his voice. Phobia decided that it 
would be better to consider Pantron as anassociate than a prisoner.

"Now on to the Maximal base."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, ddsg sdgfd <earth2025abc@y...> wrote:
> 
>  
> Pantron was jerked up by a in comeing transmittion. He knew who it 
was and the news he brought was stagareing. He turned to Phoobia, "Im 
sorry. My place is not here. I will take a pod and leave. Before he 
could hear a reaction Pantron leapd into beast mode and pounded down 
the hall way. He jumped into the escape pod and jetisned out. The pod 
landed on the ground swiftly enough. He opened the door. As the steam 
cleared the bot showed. He could not believe his eyes! Bobertron had 
come back!
>   Dachande85@a... wrote: 
> ::CyberShark::
> 
>     He transformed to flight mode and headed toward the ocean. He 
figured 
> that she couldn't swim because anybody who has swam has loved the 
water and 
> wants to again (CyberShark only knew swimming bots, and I am a 
swimmer on a 
> team). He neared the ocean and transformed to Beast Mode. He let 
himself fall 
> toward the ocean. When he hit it felt wonderful to be back. He swam 
around 
> for a few minutes and then headed toward shore.
>     Nearing the shore he transformed back to robot mode so he 
wouldn't get 
> beached. He walked out of the water and sat on the beach. He looked 
at his 
> tail/hand, it was useless for swimming in robot mode. But he could 
manage to 
> teach someone.
> 
> (In reality I haven't taught anyone how to swim, I've just helped, 
so bear 
> with me.)
>
